title: HEX Color Codes
description: Learn about HEX format for representing colors

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: HEX (hexadecimal) format is widely used in web design. It consists of a # symbol and six hexadecimal digits.

format.title: Format
format.content: HEX code consists of a # symbol and six characters (0-9, A-F), representing red, green, and blue channels with two characters each.

usage.title: Usage
usage.content: HEX format is compact, easy to read, and widely supported in CSS and web development. It's ideal for web design.
